description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zombies took away the peace and power from the Serene City.  Rescue the civilians and bring back light into their lives. Enjoy two challenging modes - Sentinel  and Survival.  A dark adventure awaits you with cool upgrades!
description.short: Zombies took away the peace and power from the Serene City.  Rescue the civilians and bring back light into their lives. Enjoy two challenging modes - Sentinel  and Survival.  A dark adventure awaits you with cool upgrades!
